hero.description: I design and build modern, high-performance applications.

description.0: I am a passionate and motivated computer science student, always ready to take on new challenges and keep learning. I've had the opportunity to work on a variety of projects, which has helped me develop both my technical skills and my ability to collaborate effectively, even under pressure.
description.1: I'm particularly passionate about web and software development. I love discovering new technologies, experimenting, and sharing my knowledge with others so we can grow together.
description.2: Currently a third-year student at Epitech in the Grande École Program, I'm constantly looking for opportunities to apply what I've learned and contribute to real-world projects.
